item.title: ‘Tactical all-out warfare first-person shooter’ WARDOGS announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Due out in Early Access in 2026.

Publisher Team17 and developer BULKHEAD have announced WARDOGS, a “tactical all-out warfare first-person shooter” that promises to be a new take on large-scale shooters. It will launch in Early Access for PC via Steam in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

WARDOGS is an all-out warfare first-person shooter that combines tactical gunplay and combined arms combat with building and destruction mechanics in a large-scale, up to 100-player militaristic sandbox.

The game mode—inspired by “King of the Hill”—has three teams fight for control of a randomized 2x2km “Control Zone” within a 256km² map. The team with the most players within the Control Zone earns points—the first team to reach 100 points wins the match. The variables in zone location and individual player tactics mean no match ever plays out the same.

Persistent Cash Metagame

In WARDOGS—Every. Decision. Matters.

Every player starts their journey with $10,000. Each life, you purchase a custom loadout from a wide selection of weapons, gear, utility, and vehicles to help your team win the match.

Every teamplay action you perform rewards cash. From reviving squadmates, transporting friendlies to the zone, or controlling the objective. We don’t just encourage teamplay; we reward it. It’s the player’s choice how they want to play, earn and spend their profits.

Cash persists from match to match, so spending big on better gear, equipment, or a vehicle at the right time has the potential to turn the tide of battle and could yield massive returns.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Play Your Way

You choose how you want to play and profit.

There’s no one way to play, earn and progress. Instead, WARDOGS gives players the freedom to take on the Control Zone in any number of ways. Whether you’re a lone wolf helping out your team or part of a dedicated squad, how you approach the battlefield is entirely up to you.

You could chase the “Hot Zone” to earn double the cash, purchase a ghillie suit and snipe from a distance, or ferry supplies to teammates by helicopter. Additionally, you could choose to fortify a strategic chokepoint by building your own forward operating base, or if you’re feeling destructive… man an artillery tank and rain down destruction on the enemy.

There are no set rules of engagement. It’s ultimately your choice how you want to approach the battlefield.

Destruction and Base Building

Bring the chaos to tactical warfare.

Destroy apartment blocks with rocket launchers or tear your way through towns in heavily armored tanks. The world around you reacts to your presence. Conversely, strategize with your teammates to build upon and fortify key locations within the map for a tactical advantage.

100 Percent Player-Driven Sandbox

Every Moment in WARDOGS is 100 percent player driven and tied together with local voice chat to either talk tactics with teammates or troll enemy players. This is not another “battle royale.” This is not another “extraction shooter.” WARDOGS is a new Tactical take on the all-out warfare first-person shooter genre that rewards decision making, communication and teamwork—and allows you to play how you want within a modern militaristic setting.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: ‘Next-generation skateboarding game’ Skate Style announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Featuring a built-in animation editor.

Zellah Games has announced Skate Style, a “next-generation skateboarding game” with a built-in animation editor. It will launch for PC via Steam in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via Zellah Games:

About

Skate Style is a next-generation skateboarding experience that puts creativity and control in your hands. Blend physics-driven gameplay with a powerful animation editor to define your own style—no two tricks will ever look the same.

As well as responsive rides, Skate Style transports you to iconic IRL skating hotspots, with ulta-detailed maps based on the streets of Barcelona and Prague. Use cinematic tools to capture your best lines and share easily with the community, all using a detailed custom avatar designed by you.

With mod support, replay sharing, and ongoing updates, Skate Style isn’t just a game, it’s a platform for creativity, community, and self-expression.

Key Features

  • Animation Studio – Dial in your trick style to perfection. Tweak body movement, foot placement, timing, and flow with a powerful built-in animation editor. Create signature styles, replicate legendary pros, or invent something entirely new.
  • Physics-Based Trick System – Feel every push, flip, and grind with a deeply tuned, physics-driven control system. Skate Style puts you in full control. Although Skate Style comes with a built in animation editor the tricks are still driven by physics. The animations are used as guides for the physics driven skateboard. This means the feet will actually catch the board and no trick will be the same—just pure, responsive skating.
  • Advanced Character Editor – Build your skater from the trucks up. Shape faces, bodies, outfits, and gear with incredible detail. Every skater is unique—customize clothing, facial morphs, hair, board setups, and more.
  • Replay and Clip Editor – Nail the perfect line and then relive it your way. Use cinematic camera tools, slow-motion, and dynamic angles to turn your best tricks into edit-worthy clips. Share your style with the world.
  • Iconic Real-World Maps
    • Barcelona – Cruise through the heart of skateboarding’s European capital, from MACBA to hidden alleys and iconic ledges.
    • Stalin Plaza (Prague) – A world-renowned spot, now fully recreated in beautiful detail. Flatground heaven, long ledges, perfect marble—your canvas awaits.
  • Built for the Community – Mod support, replay sharing, and regular content updates are just the beginning. Skate Style is a platform for skaters, creators, and digital filmers alike.
  • Realism Meets Artistry – Powered by cutting-edge graphics and motion technology, Skate Style offers a visually stunning experience that doesn’t just look real—it feels real. From the gritty texture of the concrete to the scuff marks on your deck, every detail is crafted for authenticity. The game leverages the latest ray tracing technology for high-end systems, while still delivering smooth performance—running at 40 to 60 frames per second on lower-end hardware like the Steam Deck using the lowest graphics settings.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

item.title: Birushana: Winds of Fate launches May 26 in the west
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

Otome visual novel dated.

Otome visual novel Birushana: Winds of Fate will for Switch both physically and digitally on May 26 in the west for $49.99 / €49.99 / £49.99, publisher Idea Factory International announced.

Birushana: Winds of Fate first launched for Switch on March 31, 2022 in Japan.

The physical standard edition of the game will include a trading card pack while supplies last. Each pack will consist of nine trading cards, including one of each love interest. One random trading card within the pack will have a special holographic finish.

Here is an overview of the game, via Idea Factory International:

About

Fifteen years after the Heiji Rebellion, the Heike clan has reached the height of its power, while the Genji clan remains devastated by defeat.

Hidden deep within the mountains of Kurama lives Shanao, the youngest surviving male heir to the Genji name. However, Shanao harbors a deep secret known to very few…

The youngest heir to the Genji name is no man.

Epilogues

With the war over, peace has finally returned to the land.

After our heroine carved out a new fate, these sweet epilogues tell the story of what happened after the events of the first game.

What does the future have in store for a girl who was born to fight?

Main Routes

New stories await our heroine…

The youngest child of the Genji, Shanao, has been driven out of Kyoto by the Heike.

What fate awaits her as she strives to hide her identity and live as a man in a world torn apart by war?

Key Features

  • We’re So Back – Beloved protagonist Shanao is back in this highly anticipated fan disc! Explore nine routes in total, including four Main Routes with all-new love interests, and five returning love interests in the Epilogues.
  • What Comes After – Pick up the story where the original Birushana: Rising Flower of Genpei ended in five epilogue routes. With love having bloomed on the battlefield, see what life is like for Shanao and her man of choice after the war has ended.
  • Turning a New Leaf – Return to the time of war in the all-new Main Routes. Featuring four new love interests, including the Sato brothers, relive moments from the first game from new perspectives and maybe even discover new romance.
  • This Action Will Have Consequences – Throughout the new Main Routes, you will have to make tough decisions. These choices will change your affection levels with certain characters and ultimately affect the outcome of your story. Which ending will you receive?

item.title: Dread Delusion coming to PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PS4, and Xbox One this spring
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Retro-styled open-world RPG adventure.

Publisher DreadXP and developer Lovely Hellplace will release open-world RPG Dread Delusion for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One this spring, the companies announced.

Dread Delusion first launched in Early Access for PC via Steam on June 15, 2022, followed by a full release on May 14, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via DreadXP:

Inspired by ’90s and ’00s adventure classics like King’s Field and The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind, Dread Delusion combines a gorgeous, nostalgic art style with classic RPG gameplay, allowing players to shape their character to suit their playstyle as they explore the vast world. Upon launch, the console versions will include all the updates added to the Steam version throughout Early Access, bringing features like Hard Mode, airship customization, and the Creature Island content to Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 4 and 5, and Xbox One and Series X|S.

Dread Delusion is an open-world RPG with a beautiful retro 3D aesthetic and gameplay inspired by classic RPGs of the 2000s that any fan of the genre’s classics will love and recognize. The adventure delivers an engaging narrative and imaginative world-building through its numerous multiple-ending quests, flexible gameplay options, and a multitude of places to explore, questlines to unweave, and locals to meet. A keen mind or charming wit can prove just as useful as a sharp sword and mighty spells, and your decisions have the power to shape how the story unfolds in this modernized yet retro take on the genre. Build your character to face obstacles the way you want. There’s always an alternative to combat: charm NPCs, pick locks, harness forbidden knowledge, and more…

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Thomas & Friends: Wonders of Sodor announced for PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

From Train Sim World developer Dovetail Games.

Train Sim World series developer Dovetail Games has announced narrative adventure game Thomas & Friends: Wonders of Sodor for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store). A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its official website:

About

Join Thomas and his friends on a special journey across Sodor! Hop into the cabs of North Western Railway’s classic steam team to enjoy nostalgic stories and all-new narratives right from the drivers’ seats. Explore the Wonders of Sodor – fun and magic await!

Experience the Wonders of Sodor

Join Thomas and friends on a special journey across the Island of Sodor! Hop into the cab of the North Western Railway’s classic steam team, and enjoy nostalgic stories and all-new narratives right from the driver’s seat. Embark on a magical journey and explore the Wonders of Sodor as you’ve never seen them before!

A New Adventure Awaits

  • Operate Beloved Characters – Take the controls of Thomas, Percy, Gordon, Emily, and Diesel to explore iconic landmarks across the Island of Sodor.
  • Familiar Tales Return – Thomas & Friends: Wonders of Sodor tells classic and original tales inspired by the publishing and content series, now told for the first time in an interactive, first-person perspective.
  • A Faithful Recreation of Sodor – Experience the sights, sounds, and feelings of Sodor as you explore iconic Thomas & Friends locations like you’ve never seen them before, including Tidmouth Sheds, Knapford Station, and the famous Windmills.
  • ❮
  • ❯

Meet the Characters

  • Thomas – Thomas is a cheekų little engine, and he often gets into scrapes, usually by being over-eager to do things best left to bigger engines. But clouds never last long in Thomas’ world and soon he’s bustling about again, playing his part in the railway. He loves having new adventures and meeting new friends.
  • Diesel – Diesel is often the foil to Thomas and his other friends. He believes himself to be the most important and useful engine on Sodor. He believes steam engines are no match for diesels and often tries to prove this through schemes that ultimately cause confusion and delay. Despite his best efforts, Diesel’s plans rarely go the way he expects.
  • Emily – Clever, cheerful and confident, Emily always looks to find a logical explanation by thinking through the problems she faces. An emerald green Stirling engine, Emily likes to be busy and loves being challenged. She is very safety-minded, and has a kind nature. She always looks after her friends.
  • Gordon – Gordon is a large tender engine and pulls the Express. He is one of the fastest, most powerful engines. Gordon tends to be overly-confident and takes himself quite seriously. He will jump at any chance to show his speed, if he does not think the job is beneath him!
  • Percy – Percy is a small green engine, who is also Thomas’ best friend! He may be cautious and easily flustered, but Percy is able to muster great bravery when the time calls. He is often treated as the youngest of the core characters.

Multiple Ways to Play

  • Explore the Island – See all the engines running about the island doing their daily tasks, get involved by driving Thomas on his branch line, or even ride as a passenger!
  • Powered by Train Sim World – Combining the unparalleled detail and realism of Unreal Engine and Simugraph with accessible controls to create a nostalgic experience that all Thomas & Friends fans can enjoy.
  • Beloved Stories – A total of 8 stories await including Thomas & Gordon, Thomas & Bertie’s Great Race, Percy’s Troublesome Day, and more. Each story features full narration by the legendary Mark Moraghan for the ultimate storytelling immersion.

Gameplay Features for Everyone to Enjoy

  • Master the Shunting Challenge – Show your skills across the Shunting Challenge and show Sir Topham Hatt just how useful you can be.
  • Explore With Timetable Mode – Help Thomas and his friends be really useful engines across a full working schedule for the Island of Sodor.
  • Collect Hidden Items Across Sodor – While exploring the island, look out for hidden collectables to find!

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

item.title: Outpath coming to PS5, Xbox Series, and Switch on February 19
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Currently available for PC.

Silver Lining Interactive will release David Moralejo Sanchez-developed clicker base building game Outpath for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and Switch on February 19, the publisher announced.

Outpath first launched for PC via Steam on October 16, 2023.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Outpath invites players to explore unknown, pixel-stylized islands at their own pace. Gather. Craft. Build. Explore. Relax. No time limits, no pressure, just you and the big world! The game already stole the hearts of PC players with its 94 percent Positive reviews on Steam, and with its arrival on consoles, console players will be able to enjoy this adventure both on the big screen, and on the go!

Key Features

  • Craft, gather, and manage resources to build your base and unlock new tools and items.
  • Expand your domain by buying additional islands—explore, exploit, and grow your land.
  • Automate production and build systems, or play manually, the choice is yours.
  • Optional idlet / clicker mechanics—ideal for players who prefer laid-back progression without pressure.

Watch the announcement trailer below.
